tag_list: ron-touchard, entrepreneur, futurenet-international, pricenetusa-com, ceo, president, network-marketing
overview:
Ron Touchard has been a top network marketing distributor and consultant for over 20 years. He has built several large network marketing companies and developed an audio training course for entrepreneurs.

Ron Touchard’s training course has been advertised on national infomercials and has helped private and public companies to achieve financial success. He also conducts marketing seminars and has been featured on the covers of several magazines.

Over the past five years, Ron Touchard has been successful marketing products associated with the Internet within 2 different companies, FutureNet International and PriceNet USA.Com. He was also a major stockholder in both companies.
